description:
John Force is a legend in the sport and this pack puts you in the driver's seat with Team Force to further build on this formidable legacy.  

The John Force Racing (JFR) Pack loads you up with:

•	Alternative paint scheme for the John Force Funny Car
•	Alternative paint scheme for the Brittany Force Top Fuel Car
•	JFR-inspired vehicle paint scheme
•	JFR-inspired parachute
•	JFR-inspired design for vehicle hauler
•	JFR-inspired Driver’s Suit
name: NHRA Championship Drag Racing: Speed for All – John Force Racing Pack
